name: part_002
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2025 ーYour True Colorsー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [etiR9Qnqlmc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal introduces the next song to the audience.
Performance of 'Ao no Sumika' with guests Shuha and B-do.
MC section where Aki introduces her guests Shuha and B-do.

subtitles.original: 新曲をお披露目もあるから
subtitles.english: I'll also be debuting a new song, so

subtitles.original: 最後まで楽しんでいってね！
subtitles.english: please enjoy until the very end!

subtitles.original: ということで、次の曲早速行っちゃいましょう！
subtitles.english: So, let's get right into the next song!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: 青のすみか。
subtitles.english: Ao no Sumika.

subtitles.original: どこまでも続くような青の季節は
subtitles.english: The blue season that seemed to go on forever

subtitles.original: 四つ並ぶ眼の前を遮るものは何もない
subtitles.english: There's nothing blocking the view before our four eyes

subtitles.original: アスファルト　蝉時雨を反射して
subtitles.english: The asphalt reflects the chorus of cicadas

subtitles.original: 君という沈黙が聞こえなくなる
subtitles.english: The silence that is you becomes inaudible

subtitles.original: この日々が色褪せる
subtitles.english: These days fade

subtitles.original: 僕と違う君の匂いを知ってしまっても
subtitles.english: Even if I've come to know your scent, so different from mine

subtitles.original: 置き忘れてきた永遠の底に
subtitles.english: At the bottom of the eternity we left behind

subtitles.original: 今でも青が棲んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, blue resides there

subtitles.original: 今でも青は澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, blue is clear

subtitles.original: どんな祈りも言葉も近づけるのに届かなかった
subtitles.english: No matter the prayers or words, they didn't reach despite bringing them close

subtitles.original: まるで静かな恋のような
subtitles.english: Just like a quiet love

subtitles.original: 頬を伝った夏のような色のなか
subtitles.english: In colors like the summer that ran down my cheeks

subtitles.original: 君を呪う言葉がずっと喉の奥につかえてる
subtitles.english: The words to curse you are forever stuck in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: 「また会えるよね」って
subtitles.english: Saying, 'We'll meet again, right?'

subtitles.original: 声にならない声
subtitles.english: A voice that won't become a sound

subtitles.original: 昼下がり　湿つく風の季節は
subtitles.english: In the early afternoon, in the season of the clinging wind

subtitles.original: 想い馳せる　まだ何者でもなかった僕らの肖像
subtitles.english: Reflecting on the portraits of us, when we were still no one

subtitles.original: 何もかも分かち合えたはずだった
subtitles.english: We should have been able to share everything

subtitles.original: あの日から少しずつ　君と違う僕を呪いが生い茂って
subtitles.english: From that day on, little by little, curses grew over the part of me that's different from you

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔と僕の憂いを見落としたこと悔やみ尽くして
subtitles.english: Regretting to no end the fact that I overlooked your smile and my own sorrow

subtitles.original: あだ花と咲いて散っていく君に
subtitles.english: To you, who blooms like a sterile flower and then withers

subtitles.original: さよなら
subtitles.english: Goodbye

subtitles.original: 今でも青が棲んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, blue resides there

subtitles.original: 今でも青は澄んでいる
subtitles.english: Even now, blue is clear

subtitles.original: どんな祈りも言葉も近づけるのに届かなかった
subtitles.english: No matter the prayers or words, they didn't reach despite bringing them close

subtitles.original: まるで静かな恋のような
subtitles.english: Just like a quiet love

subtitles.original: 頬を伝った夏のような色のなか
subtitles.english: In colors like the summer that ran down my cheeks

subtitles.original: 君を呪う言葉がずっと喉の奥につかえてる
subtitles.english: The words to curse you are forever stuck in the back of my throat

subtitles.original: 「また会えるよね」って
subtitles.english: Saying, 'We'll meet again, right?'

subtitles.original: 声にならない声
subtitles.english: A voice that won't become a sound

subtitles.original: 無限に膨張する銀河の星の粒のように僕らは零れた
subtitles.english: Like the grains of stars in an infinitely expanding galaxy, we spilled out

subtitles.original: はーいみんなー！
subtitles.english: Hi, everyone!

subtitles.original: アロダー！
subtitles.english: Alo-da!

subtitles.original: ということで、本日、アキロゼ生誕祭
subtitles.english: And so, the first guests for today's Aki Rose Birthday Festival

subtitles.original: ゲスト最初に来ていただいたのは、柊派さん！
subtitles.english: are Shuha-san...

subtitles.original: そして、Bど君！
subtitles.english: ...and B-do-kun!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでぴょー！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday-pyo!

subtitles.original: ありがとうありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you.

subtitles.original: いやーやったね。
subtitles.english: Man, we did it.

subtitles.original: すごいなんか、アイドルみたい。
subtitles.english: Wow, it's like we're idols.

subtitles.original: まるで。
subtitles.english: Just like.

subtitles.original: まるで。
subtitles.english: Just like.

subtitles.original: いやいやアイドルですけどね、元から。
subtitles.english: No, no, I've been an idol from the start.

subtitles.original: 全然知らなくて。
subtitles.english: I had no idea.

subtitles.original: 知らなかったね。
subtitles.english: We didn't know, did we?

subtitles.original: アイドル部分なんか見せずに来てたからね、今までね。
subtitles.english: Well, I've been coming along without showing my idol side until now.

subtitles.original: ギャングしか知らない。
subtitles.english: We only know the gang side.

subtitles.original: すごい変わった方だなと思ってたけど。
subtitles.english: I thought you were a really strange person, but...

subtitles.original: アイドルとは関係なく。
subtitles.english: ...unrelated to being an idol.

subtitles.original: もしかしたら違ったのかも知れないね。
subtitles.english: Maybe I was mistaken.

subtitles.original: どうかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder?

subtitles.original: でもすごい。
subtitles.english: But it's amazing.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: さすがね。
subtitles.english: As expected.

subtitles.original: 3人で歌ってみたいなと思ってお願いして来てもらっちゃったんだけど。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to sing with the three of us, so I asked and they came.

subtitles.original: 歌ってもらったんですけど...
subtitles.english: Even though I had them sing...

subtitles.original: でもね、歌は、まあ、いけると...
subtitles.english: But you know, for the singing, well, I think we can...
